question_sentence: A new strain of which common sexually transmitted infection (STI) has been found lurking in the Arctic seabed?
Which militant organisation has overtaken Islamic State as the world’s “deadliest terror group”, according to a new report from defence intelligence experts?
Which country has pledged to significantly ramp up oil production in order to support Saudi Arabia’s oil price war against Russia?
Which joyous, boozy festival celebrated earlier this week is dubbed the “Jewish Mardi Gras”?
WikiLeaks whistle-blower Chelsea Manning was released from custody on Thursday after almost a year in jail for contempt of court - but which offence was she NOT convicted of in 2013?
In his debut Budget, Chancellor Rishi Sunak unveiled a stimulus package totalling how much to boost the UK economy?
Donald Trump announced a ban on flights from Europe’s Schengen zone to the US that is currently scheduled to last for how long?
The partner of which world leader has tested positive for coronavirus?
Which company has bought energy-drink maker Rockstar for $3.85bn?
Which newly released film has offended critics including Donald Trump?
The United States census is underway. How often does this nationwide head count take place?
evidence: The US census happens every ten years.

question_sentence: Joe Biden gained significant ground in the race for the Democratic  when six states went to the polls on Tuesday. Which state that voted had the most delegates up for grabs?
evidence: Biden won Michigan, which was the biggest prize of the night with 125 delegates.

question_sentence: This country went under complete lockdown to try and curb the dire coronavirus situation growing within its borders.
evidence: Italy went under a complete lockdown to try and combat the coronavirus. It is currently dealing with the worst coronavirus outbreak in Europe.

question_sentence: An international scandal involving the administration of performance-enhancing drugs is rocking which sporting community?
evidence: Twenty-seven trainers trainers, veterinarians and drug distributors have been indicted in a scheme to administer performance-enhancing drugs to racehorses.

question_sentence: Modell’s Sporting Goods has announced it is filing for bankruptcy and closing all stores. What was the retail chain’s famous tagline?
evidence: “Gotta go to Mo’s” has appeared on billboards and in jingles for the sporting goods store for decades.

question_sentence: Sports leagues across the US cancelled playoffs, suspended seasons and postponed openings due to the coronavirus threat. Which of these leagues had a player test positive for Coronavirus?
evidence: The NBA suspended its season after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for coronavirus.

question_sentence: Which world leader’s country approved changes to their constitution, allowing him to stay in power long after the regular terms of his presidency run out?
evidence: Vladimir Putin has voiced support for change to the Russian constitution that could extend his presidency to 2036.

question_sentence: What country has made drastic threats to fight for its share in the oil market, leading experts to worry their actions could sink the entire global economy?
evidence: Saudi Arabia has broken agreements with global oil powers and threatened to increase its oil production, setting the entire oil market on edge and causing worldwide markets to drop.

question_sentence: Turkey recently broke an agreement with the European Union and began letting migrants cross the country’s border, creating a migrant crisis in what European country?
evidence: Greece is staying firm in keeping its borders closed to migrants, creating a backup of people along its border with Turkey.

question_sentence: A new environmental report has issued a dire warning that this ecological wonder, if not taken proper care of, could be decimated within a span of 50 years.
evidence: Scientists have warned that it would only take 50 years for the Amazon Rainforest to become a grassy savannah if measures aren't taken to prevent its collapse.
